answers.answer: call all the clinic's in your area and see if they would set up a pay back plan with you...so much per month. why do you think you kitty is dying whats the matter with her?....also try calling the local aspca to see if they can help♥

i did all day sat and no one would help .Should i drive to these vets and maybe then i'll get help?my baby is lethargic drinking water like i've never seen, lots and eating so much food & sleeping alote not responding  to me. could she be Diabetic????

yes by what you describe the symptoms sound very much like diabetes...how old is she?if this is diabetes she will go into a coma and she will die, I sure hope you can get some Vet care.try to get her to eat some canned food that has NO grains in the meantime, but otherwise theres is little you can do without a Vet....... :(
